description:
Teaching computational thinking in the classroom is a challenge as there's a wide range of skills, including the teacher's.
The Gigglebot is a microbit rover that covers the steps from no coding to Python coding through a variety of approaches so that no one in the classroom gets left behind.


Presentation page -- https://2018.pycon.ca/talks/talk-PC-54340
Author website --  http://eleanorstrib.com/
title: From Zero Code to Python Code
